name: Crushed (itch) (elektito)
description:
This is an simple (and, well, rather ugly!) game in which you try to keep the crushing forces of the world at bay while keeping your plant alive.

There are only two actions in the game. Click your plant to water it. Click on the weights being dropped on you to get rid of them. Watering the plant takes a bit of time in which you can't do anything else.

The game is over if the plant dies or the crushing weights become too many.
